name: Q2Weapons
title: Quake 2 Weapons
author: HeyRevolver, Updated by Atom to 0.12.X
description: A small weapons pack that adds my three favorite video game weapons of all time,(the Quake 2 Railgun, Rocket Launcher, and Super Shotgun), to Factorio. They are tuned for late game use and will be the only three weapons you ever need!
